channel.title: menu on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery
channel.description: Recent content in menu on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery

item.title: Case Layout
item.description: 1 Case timer – Displays the duration of the surgical case. 2 Record video button – Starts and stops recording video of the screen. A red dot appears next to the case when a case is being recorded. 3 Snapshot button – Takes a picture of the screen. 4 Information panel – Displays basic information to identify the current patient and case. 5 Quick Access Bar – Includes buttons to quickly change various display settings.
